channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Waymo experimenting with generative AI, but exec says LiDAR and radar sensors important to self-driving safety ‘under all conditions’
item.description: Waymo is experimenting with generative AI, but its current approach is a stark contrast to one of its newer rivals, Tesla.

item.title: Tommy McLain, the King of Swamp Pop, Dies at 85
item.description: Playing a blend of rock, R&B and zydeco, he had a hit in 1966 with “Sweet Dreams” and inspired Elvis Costello, Nick Lowe and many others.

item.title: Trump Administration Backs Off New Attempt to Widen Control of D.C. Police
item.description: The chief will remain after a lawsuit challenged the Justice Department’s attempt to install a new leader as part of an effort to put the agency under...

item.title: At Trump’s Summit, No Deal on Ukraine, and No Consequence for Putin
item.description: President Trump’s failure to reach an accord on Ukraine only made his warm welcome for the Russian leader more striking.

item.title: For Some Venetians, This Overgrown Island Is Paradise
item.description: A citizens’ group is now in charge of the island of Poveglia, where they will create a park for anyone who wants to leave Venice’s maddening crowds of...

item.title: Once Seen as Divisive, South Korea’s New Leader Tries for Charming
item.description: To South Koreans weary of the political polarization that led briefly to martial law, President Lee Jae Myung is showing a more human touch than his p...

item.title: Trump says ‘we didn’t get there’ but touts progress as meeting with Putin ends without a deal to stop Ukraine war
item.description: "We had an extremely productive meeting, and many points were agreed to and there are just a very few that are left."

item.title: Spain’s Old Ways May Show How to Keep Cool
item.description: The tradition of the siesta is no accident. Spain has been living with extreme heat for centuries, and its people have ways of coping.

item.title: Live Updates: Trump Says There Is ‘No Deal’ on Ukraine After Summit With Putin
item.description: President Trump and President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia offered vague statements about progress after their nearly three-hour meeting. But they took...

item.title: Why Putin Can Visit the U.S. Without Risking Arrest
How Trump-Putin Summit Signals Return to Imperial Thinking
item.description: The two leaders are bringing some old-world approaches to bear on a 21st-century conflict.

item.title: DC’s attorney general says Trump’s police takeover is illegal and will ‘wreak operational havoc’ in the capital

item.title: Trump’s Social Security tax cuts could hit future generations hard and propel the program’s insolvency by 2032, research warns
